Description: Wooden model group of a butcher's shop, with seven figures, painted red, black and white.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Deir el-Bersha, Said to come from tomb of Gua (Guide to 1st Egn Rm, 43)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2002, St Albans, Life and Death 2019 28 Feb - 27 May, London, BM, G5, Feeding History: the politics of food
